Attributes.description: Preparation to transition into the theatre and film industry. Portfolio development, visual identity, and skills to support professional performance practices aligned with theatre and film professional associations.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Pre or Corequisites: One of THTR 305, THTR 306, THTR 307, THTR 308, FIPR 333)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Wed, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 16:00, Building: Theatre-Film, Room: Production
